commit.message: Enable running flake8 over examples with tox
Fix flake8 issues in mines example
Fix flake8 issues in ptext example
Fix flake8 issues in missiles and particles examples
Fix flake8 issues in Pong example
Fix flake8 issues in memory game example
Fix flake8 issues in asteroids example
Fix flake8 issues for lander example + refactor
Document how to add builtins for flake8/pyflakes
Request a redraw if dimensions changed (fixes #126)
Update sound format tests for Pygame 2.1
Convert test names to snake case

Make Actor.rect() an undocumented method

It is better as a method because Pygame calls hasattr(actor, 'rect')
which will itself call the function and thus copy the rect; this results
in two copies. As a method there is only one copy.

It is better as undocumented because the aim is for Actor to duck-type
like a rect in its own right: it doesn't seem necessary for API
completeness to be able to copy the rect. But this could be documented
later if we decide to.
